attributes.action: Universities face-to-face teaching in 2021 or money back
attributes.additional_details:
I want government to consider this petition because in the world as we know it to be able to get a university degree you need to have wealth behind you. Which is extremely unfair, as the life we are brought into is not chosen.
I am a 20 year old student with a single parent, my mother works hard enough. But now she is forced to word harder so that I can have an eduction. £9,250 tuition fee for zoom calls all year? This does not sound worth it for anyone.
attributes.background: Give students their tuition fee back, as we are already paying thousands a year on accommodation that we really do not need to be in. OR at-least give us the next academic year at a significant discount (50-80%)

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Deciding when to resume face-to-face teaching is, provided this is consistent with current Covid-19 regulations, a decision for individual universities, not the Government or House of Commons.
